news: [Functional Roadmap] New database vendors Netezza Mckoi CockroachDB, Injection strategies: DIOS RoutedQuery OOB UpdateInsertDelete, Full Path Disclosure, Bruteforce HTTP Auth using NTLM, Dictionnary attack, WAF detection.
[Technical Roadmap] Unit test with Jacoco, Integration test with Docker and JPA Hibernate Jooq, Maven Central: jsql-injection-core jsql-injection-swing jsql-injection-cli.
[Since last release] Database Node renaming on F2 and Context Menu, Injection using Coldfusion, Database flavor: Neo4j NuoDB Hana and Vertica, Russian translation complete.
[In progress] Load rows starting from an index, New language: Polish, Updates for Czech Chinese and French, User Agent configuration.

[Feature] Help the community and translate jSQL into your language. Click on the top right button to show the advanced settings and open menu Community, choose a language using 'I help translate jSQL' and translate some text then click on Send. Your translation will be integrated to the next release by the developer.
